query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS upgrade_violations (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  upgradeLogId INT,
  playerId VARCHAR(64),
  playerName VARCHAR(255),
  upgradeType VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  violationType VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  ruleViolated TEXT NOT NULL,
  details TEXT NOT NULL,
  severity VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  resolved BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  resolvedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  resolvedBy VARCHAR(255),
  notes TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user waCuRew5RKYFFjj.root --database DS68jwRuNTWiz9tNrw6KXW --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS upgrade_violations (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  upgradeLogId INT,
  playerId VARCHAR(64),
  playerName VARCHAR(255),
  upgradeType VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  violationType VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  ruleViolated TEXT NOT NULL,
  details TEXT NOT NULL,
  severity VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  resolved BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  resolvedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  resolvedBy VARCHAR(255),
  notes TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
